Welcome to my webspace!!


Hello! Thanks for taking time to visit. I am Aaditya Thakkar and this is a tiny part of the web I call my own. I'm a B.tech student at DA-IICT, India. I am a part time web developer, open-source contributor, intern at appbase.io and sometimes writer. Everything I do of interest is kept here, so I can keep track of it all and maybe even inspire someone. so enjoy!

I am very enthusiastic about working with computers and thus, I possess a variety of skills in this area. I enjoy programming very much and my choice of programming languages are C++ and Java, which I have been using since two years. I am also comfortable with other programming languages like Python and C. I am also well experienced with full-stack web development. I have done many open source projects and also contributed to many open source organizations. In addition to all these, I like to travel, read books and watch tv-series and movies a lot. I also write reviews of books I read.
